name: revisory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the ability to revise (= correct or improve) something, especially a law or a decision: The court may exercise its revisory power under certain circumstances, such as clear instances of fraud. The legislation will pass to a revisory committee before being voted on.
More examplesFewer examplesIn this system of government, the second revisory chamber of Parliament may propose amendments to draft bills.The court does not sit in a revisory capacity.A revisory review was ordered into the current system.
